summary: Ramanna, a maniac murderer, finds a soulmate in Raghavan, a policeman, who inspects his murder cases. He tries to make Raghavan realize how they both are similar.
cast: Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Vicky Kaushal|Sobhita Dhulipala|Mukesh Chhabra|Anuschka Sawhney|Vipin Sharma|Deepali Suryakant Badekar|Ashok Lokhande|Harssh Singh|Rajesh Jais|Hitesh Dave|Vikash Bajpayee|Donald Burman|Bikram Chetti|Mohammad Farookh|Aman Gill|Pawan Gill|Chirag Gupta|Murari Kumar|Devina Medda|Sona Mohapatra|Rhea Pagar|Kalidas Parthitan|Anik Ram Verma|Robin Rebello|Amruta Subhash|Saksham Sudhija|Hirabai Tambe
title: Raman Raghav 2.0
